nodes.text: Twin Suns Transport Services was a transport company. During the Imperial Era, a convoy belonging to the company lost a GR-75 medium transport while traversing the Bakisian Drift. Word got out about the lost transport and the lucrative salvage that awaited anyone who could navigate the Drift in order to recover the cargo, resulting in hostile scavengers attempting to recover the vessel.

In the new Star Wars canon, Twin Suns Transport Services was first mentioned in the 2020 Fantasy Flight Games Star Wars Roleplaying supplement, Starships and Speeders. The company originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it first appeared in the 1999 video game Star Wars: X-Wing Alliance.
